title: Privacy Policy
intro: Ekobol is an automation platform that offers marketplace integration, sales management, inventory-order management, and AI-powered marketing tools under one roof for e-commerce businesses. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and protection of personal data when you use our Service and the rights you have associated with that data.
p1: We collect certain information to provide and improve our Service to you. This information includes:
li1_desc: When you register for our Service, we ask you to provide personal data such as your email address, name, company information, and payment details.
li2_desc: To provide our core service, we access data from your connected marketplaces, including product information, sales data, and order details. This data is processed solely on your behalf and is never shared with third parties.
li3_desc: We collect minimal technical data (session information, browser type) for system security and error detection. Important Note: IP addresses are NOT recorded, and NO 3rd party tracking cookies (Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, etc.) are used.
p2: Ekobol completely rejects 3rd party tracking cookies to protect user privacy at the highest level. There is no Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, Hotjar, or any similar tracking tool in our system. For details of this policy, please see our Zero Cookie Policy page.
p3: We use the collected data for the following purposes:
use_list: To provide and maintain our Service.
To notify you about system outages or security alerts.
To compile anonymous, aggregate statistics for improving our Service (no individual tracking is performed).
p4: The security of your data is our primary priority. All data transfers are protected with TLS 1.3 encryption. Our databases are stored encrypted and access is strictly limited by authorization controls. Passwords and payment information are never stored in plain text.
p5: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), you have the following rights: Right to access your data, right to rectification, right to erasure (right to be forgotten), right to data portability, and right to object. To exercise these rights, please contact privacy@ekobol.com.
p6: We retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for service provision. When you delete your account, your data is permanently deleted within 30 days, except for our legal retention obligations (e.g., tax regulations).
p7: Our Service contains links to third-party services such as marketplaces (Trendyol, Amazon, Hepsiburada, etc.) for integration purposes. We are not responsible for the privacy policies of these services; we recommend you review the policies of each platform you connect to.
contact: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by email. For questions, please write to <1>privacy@ekobol.com</1>.
